description:
Prometheus for system metrics. 
Load, CPU, RAM, network, process ...

panels.description: How long the system has been running.
panels.title: System Uptime

panels.description: Number of CPUs the system has
panels.title: Host CPUs

panels.description: Total amount of memory the system has
panels.title: Host Memory

panels.description: Amount of Memory the systems sees as _free_  (i.e. _$total_ - _$buffers_ - _$cached_)
panels.title: Memory Free

panels.description: Percentage of the amount of memory the system sees as available (i.e. _$free_ + _$buffers_ + _$cached_)
panels.title: Memory Available

panels.description: CPU Usage over the 5 minutes
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: The systems load average in total
panels.title: Load Average

panels.description: Memory distribution used (i.e. _$total_ - _$free_ - _$buffers_ - _$cached_) vs available (i.e. _$free_ + _$buffers_ + _$cached_)
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Memory usage distribution between _$used_, _$free_, _$buffers_, and _$cached_
panels.title: Memory Distribution

panels.description: Average rate of process forks per second over 5 minutes
panels.title: Forks

panels.description: Number of processes in _runnable_ and _blocked_ (i.e. waiting for I/O to complete) state

seriesOverrides.alias: Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete

targets.legendFormat: Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete

panels.title: Processes

panels.description: Average number of kernel context switches per second over 5 minutes
panels.title: Context Switches

panels.description: Average number of interrupts serviced per second over 5 minutes
panels.title: Interrupts

panels.description: The average network traffic received (RX) and transmitted (TX) per second over 5 minutes
panels.title: Network Traffic

panels.description: Data sent and received within one our
panels.title: Network Utilization Hourly

panels.description: Disk space used per file system in percent
panels.title: Filesystem Usage (%)

panels.description: Disk usage in Bytes per file system
panels.title: Filesystem Usage

panels.description: Percentage of average time spent per second for disk I/O operations over 5 minutes
panels.title: Disk I/O Utilisation

panels.description: Number of disk I/O operations per second (iops) currently in progress
panels.title: Disk I/O

panels.description: Average per second disk throughput (r/w) over 5 minutes
panels.title: Disk throughput

panels.description: Per second rate of pages stored to (pgpgout) and read (pgpgin) as well as page faults
panels.title: Memory Management (Paging)

panels.description: Average per second drops and errors (_RX_ and _TX_) per NIC over 5 minutes
panels.title: Network interface card (NIC) stats

panels.description: Number of TCP connections in state _established_
panels.title: TCP connection stats

title: Topic: Host
